posts.post_title: T206 SGC Graded Brooklyn Team Set 23 out of 27 Cards SOLD SOLD!!!
posts.post_content:
T206 SGC Graded Brooklyn Team Set 23 out of 27 Cards… SOLD SOLD!!!

Up for sale today is 23 out of 27 Brooklyn Players all graded by SGC. Card  Prices are from Vintage Card Prices (VCP). See bold type for two cards 
that are priced in PSA Prices(No Price available on VCP for these two cards CARDS NOT AVAILABLE IN THE SET (never got to finish set) are:  Al Burch Fielding, Tim Jordan Portrait , Zack Wheat Batting and Bill Dalhen (Brooklyn Portrait). Payment is by Paypal Gift/Money owed. I will split the fee if here is one(Can be Discussed). Cards are sold with Secured Delivery with Insurance Paid by Me. I will discuss with buyer best delivery options for them. CARDS ARE CURRENTLY BEING SOLD AS A LOT. Kindly do not make offers for individual cards. VCP Total Value is $1134SOLD. Serious Offers Only. Emails take Priority over Reply on board. Emails will be returned in the order they are received.
